00021 #include <Ogre.h>
00022 
00023 #include "OgreOggSound.h"
00024 #include "OgreOggSoundFactory.h"
00025 
00026 using namespace Ogre;
00027 using namespace OgreOggSound;
00028 
00029 String OgreOggSoundFactory::FACTORY_TYPE_NAME = "OgreOggISound";
00030 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00031 const String& OgreOggSoundFactory::getType(void) const
00032 {
00033         return FACTORY_TYPE_NAME;
00034 }
00035 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 MovableObject* OgreOggSoundFactory::createInstanceImpl( const String& name,
00037         const NameValuePairList* params)
00038 {
00039         String fileName;
00040         bool loop = false;
00041         bool stream = false;
00042         bool preBuffer = false;
00043 
00044         if (params != 0)
00045         {
00046                 NameValuePairList::const_iterator fileNameIterator = params->find("fileName");
00047                 if (fileNameIterator != params->end())
00048                 {
00049                         // Get fontname
00050                         fileName = fileNameIterator->second;
00051                 }
00052 
00053                 NameValuePairList::const_iterator loopIterator = params->find("loop");
00054                 if (loopIterator != params->end())
00055                 {
00056                         // Get fontname
00057                         loop = StringUtil::match(loopIterator->second,"true",false);
00058                 }
00059 
00060                 NameValuePairList::const_iterator streamIterator = params->find("stream");
00061                 if (streamIterator != params->end())
00062                 {
00063                         // Get fontname
00064                         stream = StringUtil::match(streamIterator->second,"true",false);
00065                 }
00066 
00067                 NameValuePairList::const_iterator preBufferIterator = params->find("preBuffer");
00068                 if (preBufferIterator != params->end())
00069                 {
00070                         // Get fontname
00071                         preBuffer = StringUtil::match(preBufferIterator->second,"true",false);
00072                 }
00073         }
00074 
00075         // when no caption is set
00076         if ( name == StringUtil::BLANK || fileName == StringUtil::BLANK )
00077         {
00078                 OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS,
00079                         "'name & fileName' parameter required when constructing an OgreOggISound.",
00080                         "OgreOggSoundFactory::createInstance");
00081         }
00082 
00083         return OgreOggSoundManager::getSingletonPtr()->createSound(name,fileName,stream,loop,preBuffer );
00084 
00085 }
00086 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00087 void OgreOggSoundFactory::destroyInstance( MovableObject* obj)
00088 {
00089         // destroy the sound
00090         OgreOggSoundManager::getSingletonPtr()->_destroy(static_cast<OgreOggISound*>(obj));
00091 }
00092 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
